main event: A civilian reported a sighting of a bright, metallic, saucer-shaped object in Goshen, New York, on September 27, 1965.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes,The object oscillated and varied in brightness,The object was estimated to be 100-150 feet in diameter,The witness had a previous sighting and was particularly excited about this one,The investigating officer regarded the witness credibility as 'poor'.
witness description: male carpenter from Goshen, NY, age 52, regarded as poorly credible
